scripts.setup: yarn prisma migrate dev --name auto --schema prisma/schemaRecords.prisma && yarn prismaGenerate
scripts.prismaGenerate: prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schemaEvent.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schemaEventData.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schemaRecords.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schemaOnline.prisma
scripts.prismaIntrospect: yarn prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaEvent.prisma && yarn prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaEventData.prisma && yarn prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaOnline.prisma
